General.Name: Shanghai 2345 Network Holding Group
General.Description: Shanghai Stonehill Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an Internet service provider in China. The company's products include 2345 Website Navigator, Explorer, Input method, Security guard, Mobile browser, Mobile assistant, weather forecast, mobile phone cleaning tool, and PDF converter, compression, and viewing software. It serves approximately 260 million PC and mobile users. The company was formerly known as Shanghai 2345 Network Holding Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Stonehill Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2023. Shanghai Stonehill Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shanghai, China.

3.Name: Mr. Jun Qi  Qiu
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
